tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vendor_info (
  vendor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contract_start_date DATE,
  contract_end_date DATE,
  contract_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_vendor_id UUID,
  contract_start_date DATE,
  contract_end_date DATE,
  contract_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (contract_vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE procurement (
    procurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Vendor (vendor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 vendor_name STRING,
 vendor_contact_info STRING,
 vendor_location STRING,
 vendor_rating FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE Contract (contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 vendor_id UUID,
 contract_name STRING,
 contract_details STRING,
 contract_value DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE Resource (resource_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 resource_name STRING,
 resource_type STRING,
 resource_price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE Procurement (procurement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 contract_id UUID,
 procurement_date DATE,
 procurement_status STRING,
 procurement_quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE Payment (payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 procurement_id UUID,
 payment_date DATE,
 payment_amount DECIMAL);
